body:
@owny  i've set it up this morning. it works for me with the following config:
https://github.com/owncloud/documentation/issues/56#issuecomment-14018008

tried it with the config you mentioned. now it's installing but no fonts are loading.
and the following errors occur:
146.0.2.254 - - [26/feb/2013:10:08:49 +0100] "get /settings/img/personal.svg http/1.1" 304 0 "http://cloud.penguinfriends.org/index.php" "opera/9.80 (macintosh; intel mac os x 10.8.2) presto/2.12.388 version/12.14"

2013/02/26 10:08:52 [error] 31154#0: *173 fastcgi sent in stderr: "unable to open primary script: /var/www/cloud.penguinfriends.org/web/remote.php (no such file or directory)" while reading response header from upstream, client: 146.0.2.254, server: cloud.penguinfriends.org, request: "get /remote.php/core.js http/1.1", upstream: "fastcgi://127.0.0.1:9000", host: "cloud.penguinfriends.org", referrer: "http://cloud.penguinfriends.org/index.php"
